description: Details pursuant to condition U0177350 - construction and demolition management plan,  U0177351 - Arboricultural method statement, U0177352 - Tree planting and soft landscaping, U0177353 - Hard landscaping, U0177355 - Construction ecological management plan, U0177356 - Ecology data bat hibernation assessment, U0177358 - Waste arrangments, U0177359 - cycle parking enclosures, and U0177366 - Materials, of planning permission 23/1101/FUL.
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt the Drawing(s) No(s)/Documention to which this decision refers are as follows:

-	Construction Management Plan – Feb 2025 - received 28.04.25
-	Construction and Demolition Plan – Home House Holdings – received 20.03.25
-	Arboricultural Method Statement – Home House Holdings – received 20.03.25
-	Planting Plan – 141/2025 – Liz Tarbit Garden Design – (2 pages) – received 20.03.25
-	Planting Schedule 22 Borad Lane TW12 3AZ – received 20.03.25
-	Landscape Management Plan - Liz Tarbit Garden Design – received 20.03.25
-	257/17A - Hard Landscaping Plan – Rev A 28.04.25 – received 28.04.25
-	257/30 - Below Ground Services Plan – March 2025 – received 28.04.25
-	Construction Ecological Management Plan – Home House Holdings – received 20.03.25
-	Bat Emergency Survey – Aval Consulting Group - September 2022 – received 20.03.25
-	Bat Hibernation Assessment – David Leach Ecology Ltd – April 2025 – received 22.04.25
-	257/16A – Bin and Cycle Storage – 21.04.25 – received 22.04.25
-	Schedule of Materials – received 20.03.25
